results.name: a(n) = A002487(n-1) AND A002487(n), where AND is bitwise-and (A004198).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: a(n) = A002487(n-1) AND A002487(n), where AND is bitwise-and (A004198).
mathematica: a[0] = 0; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := If[EvenQ@ n, a[n/2], a[(n - 1)/2] + a[(n + 1)/2]]; Table[BitAnd[a[n - 1], a@ n], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 22 2017 *)
program: (Scheme) (define (A283988 n) (A004198bi (A002487 (- n 1)) (A002487 n)))  ;; Where A004198bi implements bitwise-AND (A004198).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 21 2017
